author: msmith
msg: Try to leave the repository in a more consistent state if an IOException
occurs while writing the file to the filesystem. Set the content length
to the correct value regardless of what happens. Neccesary because this
store doesn't implement transactional capabilities.

author: remm
msg: - Update the build system to generate a distribution of Slide packaged with
Tomcat 4, as was done a while ago (but it wasn't very useful way back then).
To build, you need a Tomcat distribution based on today's CVS (I had to fix a few
problems in Catalina to have this work). This is an optional dependency.
The packaging is quite complex, so there may be some issues I didn't notice
on some configurations.

author: remm
msg: - Complete the first part of the integration with Catalina, using custom hosts.
More details on this later.

author: remm
msg: - Add a new alternative API to Slide : a JNDI directory context.
It provides only read only access to the Slide namespace, only in guest
mode.
The dir context can be used for any purpose, but the main one is to provide
a clean integration with Catalina (aka the servlet container in Tomcat 4).
Some small improvements will be added later : for example, it could use the
filesPath attrbute as the root for browsing the namespace, since it is
supposed to provide a user view of the namespace.

author: remm
msg: - Remove the links to the manager servlet.
